ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_ax-hv0cl | |- 0h e. ~H |
| 2 |  | #P_normval | |- ( 0h e. ~H -> ( normh ` 0h ) = ( sqrt ` ( 0h .ih 0h ) ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( normh ` 0h ) = ( sqrt ` ( 0h .ih 0h ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_hi01 | |- ( 0h e. ~H -> ( 0h .ih 0h ) = 0 ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( 0h e. ~H -> ( sqrt ` ( 0h .ih 0h ) ) = ( sqrt ` 0 ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 5 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( sqrt ` ( 0h .ih 0h ) ) = ( sqrt ` 0 ) |
| 7 |  | #P_sqrt0 | |- ( sqrt ` 0 ) = 0 |
| 8 | 3, 6, 7 | #P_3eqtri | |- ( normh ` 0h ) = 0 |
